Metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18214 affecting package ntopng for versions less than 5.2.1-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2017-18214 affecting package ntopng for versions less than 5.2.1-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ntopng is earlier than 5.2.1-4, affected by CVE-2017-18214
